source: Rapid Italian curated beginner phrases (aligned with Spanish beginner quiz map)

groups.title: Core Functional Words
groups.description: High-utility words and question forms used in beginner conversation.

groups.title: Greetings & Social Phrases
groups.description: Core greetings, farewells, and social courtesy phrases.

groups.title: Pronouns
groups.description: Personal pronouns and core object/prepositional forms.

items.hint: to them / to you all (indirect object)
as much as / all that (masculine singular)
as much as / all that (feminine singular)
as many as / all those (masculine plural)
as many as / all those (feminine plural)

groups.title: Possessives
groups.description: Possessive determiners and possessive pronoun forms.

groups.title: Quantifiers
groups.description: Universal and indefinite quantifier forms commonly taught to beginners.

groups.title: Prepositions
groups.description: The canonical set of Spanish prepositions.

items.hint: to the / at the (a + el contraction)
of the / from the (de + el contraction)

groups.title: Interjections
groups.description: Frequent interjections for reactions, emphasis, and exclamations.

groups.title: Directions & Location
groups.description: Phrases and words for navigating and talking about location.

items.hint: at the end of the street

groups.title: Ordering Food
groups.description: Core restaurant phrases for requesting, ordering, and paying.

items.hint: do you have a table available?
can you bring me the check?
can you bring me another napkin?

groups.title: 50 Common Adverbs
groups.description: A high-utility beginner adverb set spanning time, frequency, and manner.

groups.title: Colours
groups.description: Common basic and high-frequency colour terms.
